name: Urgent Email Alert to Telegram & Webhook

nodes.name: Gmail Trigger
nodes.notes: TRIGGER: Watches Gmail inbox for new emails with subject containing 'Urgent'. Requires Gmail OAuth2 credentials with read access. Adjust the search query as needed.

nodes.name: Extract Email Data
nodes.notes: SET NODE: Extracts and reformats the subject, sender, and snippet from the email. You can add more fields as needed.

nodes.name: Send Telegram
nodes.notes: TELEGRAM: Sends a message to the specified chat. Replace 'YOUR_CHAT_ID' with your actual Telegram chat ID. Requires Telegram credentials.

nodes.name: Log Event
nodes.notes: HTTP REQUEST: Logs the event externally. Replace the URL with your actual webhook endpoint. Adjust body parameters as needed.
